sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
	ICD.icd9_code_id		AS IcdCodeId
,	ICD.icd9_code			AS IcdCode
,	ICD.description			AS IcdDescription

FROM icd9_codes ICD
WHERE
	ICD.is_invalid = 0 AND
	ICD.Type IN ('ICD10','ICD9')

SELECT top 100
	
	CFD.claim_form_detail_code			AS 'ClaimFIRNo'
,	CFD.injury_Name						AS 'Injury'
,	CFD.isCashless						AS 'ClaimType'
,	CFD.Claim_type_Code					AS 'ClaimCategory'
,	CFD.billed							AS 'AmountBilled'
,	CFD.net								AS 'AmountNet'
,	CFD.Amount_paid						AS 'AmountPaid'
,	CFD.Dr_name							AS 'DoctorName'
,	CFD.Dr_City							AS 'DoctorCity'
,	CFD.claim_form_detail_id			AS 'ClaimFormDetailId'
,	CFD.claim_detail_id					AS 'IntimationId'
,	CFD.hosp_id							AS 'HospitalId'
,	CFD.claim_status_id					AS 'ClaimStatusId'
,	CFD.place_of_service_id				As 'PlaceofServiceId' 
,	CFD.date_service					AS 'DateofService'
,	CFD.date_paid						AS 'DatePaid'
,	CFD.date_received					AS 'DateReceived'
,	CFD.date_of_Admit					AS 'DateofAdmit'
,	CFD.injury_sustained_date			AS 'DateofInjury' 
,	CFD.document_dated					AS 'DateofDocumentation'
,	CFD.date_of_Discharge				AS 'DateofDischarge'
,	CFD.date_modified					AS 'DateModified'
,	CFD.workflow_current_sequence_id	AS 'WorkflowSequenceId'
,	CFD.member_detail_id				AS 'MemberDetailId'
,	CFD.Class_of_Accommodation			AS 'ClassofAccommodation'
,	CFD.Type_of_Hospitalization			AS 'HospitalizationType'
,	E.name								AS 'Corporate'
,	CFD.claim_form_detail_id			AS 'ClaimId'

FROM claim_form_details CFD
INNER JOIN Member_details_tmp MDT ON MDT.member_detail_id = CFD.member_detail_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN employers E ON E.employer_id = MDT.employer_id
WHERE 
	ISNULL(CFD.parent_claim_form_id,0) <> 0

SELECT TOP 100
	L.lcic_id					AS 'ClaimDiagnosisId'
,	L.claim_form_detail_id		AS 'ClaimFormDetailId'
,	L.icd9_code_id				AS 'IcdCodeId'

FROM claim_form_details CFD
INNER JOIN lnk_claim_form_icd9_code L ON L.claim_form_detail_id = CFD.claim_form_detail_id
WHERE 
	ISNULL(CFD.parent_claim_form_id,0) <> 0

SELECT TOP 100
		L.lccc_id						AS 'ClaimProcedureId' 
,		L.claim_form_detail_id			AS 'ClaimFormDetailId'
,		L.cpt_code_id					AS 'CptCodeId'
,		L.billed						AS 'Billed'
,		L.net							AS 'Net'
,		L.number_of_services			AS 'NoofServices'
,		L.place_of_service_id			AS 'PlaceofServiceId'
,		L.Amount						AS 'Amount'	
,		L.parent_service_procedure_id	AS 'ParentServiceProcedureId'
,		L.GrossAmount					AS 'GrossAmount'
,		L.Service_Start_Date			AS 'ServiceStartDate'
,		L.Service_End_Date				AS 'ServiceEndDate'
,		L.Billed_Gross					AS 'BilledGross'
,		L.Service_Net					AS 'ServiceNet'

FROM claim_form_details CFD
INNER JOIN lnk_claim_form_cpt_code L ON L.claim_form_detail_id = CFD.claim_form_detail_id
WHERE 
	ISNULL(CFD.parent_claim_form_id,0) <> 0

SELECT TOP 100
	EMP.employer_id			AS 'EmployerId'
,	EMP.employer_code		AS 'EmployerCode'
,	EMP.name				AS 'EmployerName'
,	Emp.employer_detail_id	AS 'EmployerDetailid'
,	EMP.city				AS 'EmpCity'
,	EMP.state				AS 'EmpState'
,	EMP.zip_code			AS 'EmpZipcode'
,	EMP.email				AS 'EmpEmail'
,	EMP.PremiumNet			AS 'PremiumNet'
,	EMP.PremiumGross		AS 'PremiumGross'
,	EMP.Premiumtax			AS 'Premiumtax'
,	EMP.NoOfLives			AS 'NoOfLives'
,	EMP.policyfrom			AS 'policyFromDate'
,	EMP.policyto			AS 'policyToDate'
,	EMP.agent				AS 'Agent'
,	EMP.policy_number		AS 'PolicyNo'
,	EMP.Contract_Id			AS 'PolicyId'
,	EMP.bankname			AS 'BankName'	
,	EMP.bankAccNo			AS 'BankAccNo'
,	EMP.bankcity			AS 'BankCity'
,	EMP.bankstate			AS 'BankState'

FROM employers EMP
WHERE
	EMP.isDisabled = 0

SELECT TOP 100

	P.provider_id			AS 'HospitalId'
,	P.provider_code			AS 'HospitalCode'
,	P.last_name				AS 'HospitalName' 
,	P.is_specialist			AS 'IsSpecialist'
,	P.is_referring_provider	AS 'IsReferringProvider'
,	P.provider_type_id		AS 'ProviderTypeId'
,	L.city					AS 'ProviderCity'
,	S.state_name			AS 'ProviderState'
,	C.country_name			AS 'ProviderCountry'

FROM provider_info P
INNER JOIN lnk_provider_address L ON L.provider_id =P.provider_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN states S ON S.state_id =L.state
INNER JOIN Countries C ON C.country_id =S.country_id

	member_detail_id
,	member_id
,	start_effective_date

SELECT DISTINCT 

	M.member_id
,	M.member_code
,	M.first_name
,	M.last_name
,	M.date_birth
,	M.sex
,	M.subscriber_id
,	M.user_id
,	M.FullMemberName
,	M.SequenceNo
--,	M.Date_Created
	 

FROM  member_details_tmp MDT 
INNER JOIN members_tmp M ON MDT.member_id = M.member_id

SELECT 
	P.procedure_category_id		AS ProcedureCategoryId
,	P.procedure_category_code	AS ProcedureCategoryCode
,	P.description				AS ProcedureCategoryDesc

FROM procedure_categories P

SELECT 
	CPT.cpt_code_id				AS CptCodeId
,	CPT.Cpt_Code				AS CptCode
,	CPT.description				AS CptDescription
,	CPT.procedure_category_id	AS ProcedureCategoryId

FROM cpt_codes CPT
WHERE
	CPT.is_invalid = 0 AND
	CPT.Type = 'CPT'

SELECT 
	ICD.icd9_code_id		AS IcdCodeId
,	ICD.icd9_code			AS IcdCode
,	ICD.description			AS IcdDescription

FROM icd9_codes ICD
WHERE
	ICD.is_invalid = 0 AND
	ICD.Type IN ('ICD10','ICD9')

content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimEmployers]
(
    EmployerId  INT NOT NULL
,	EmployerCode	VARCHAR(15) NULL
,	EmployerName	VARCHAR(100) NULL
,	EmployerDetailid   INT NULL
,	EmpCity	VARCHAR(50) NULL
,	EmpState	VARCHAR(20) NULL
,	EmpZipcode	VARCHAR(9) NULL
,	EmpEmail	VARCHAR(250) NULL
,	PremiumNet	Money NULL
,	PremiumGross	[decimal](18, 0) NULL
,	Premiumtax [decimal](18, 0) NULL
,	NoOfLives [decimal](18, 0) NULL
,	policyFromDate DateTime NULL
,	policyToDate	DateTime NULL
,	Agent VARCHAR(255) NULL
,	PolicyNo VARCHAR(255) NULL
,	PolicyId  INT NULL
,	BankName VARCHAR(250)	 NULL
,	BankAccNo VARCHAR(100) NULL
,	BankCity  VARCHAR(100) NULL
,	BankState  VARCHAR(100) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (EmployerId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimHospitalDetails]
(
     HospitalId INT NOT NULL
,	 HospitalCode VARCHAR(30)
,	 HospitalName VARCHAR(100)
,	 IsSpecialist BIT
,	 IsReferringProvider BIT
,	 ProviderTypeId INT
,	 ProviderCity VARCHAR(50)
,	 ProviderState VARCHAR(100)
,	 ProviderCountry VARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (HospitalId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimMemberDetails]
(
    member_detail_id int NOT NULL 
,	member_id	INT
,	start_effective_date	DateTime
,	end_effective_date	DateTime
,	location_id	INT
,	employer_id	INT
,	product_type_id	INT
,	city	VARCHAR(150)
,	state		VARCHAR(20)
,	zip_code		VARCHAR(50)
,	email			VARCHAR(50)
,	MobileNo	VARCHAR(20)
,	PanNo	VARCHAR(100)
,	DrivingNo VARCHAR(100)	
,	VoterID	VARCHAR(100)	
,	Ration_Card	VARCHAR(100)	
,	member_code_tmp	VARCHAR(20)	
,	is_missing	INT
,	AccountNo	VARCHAR(50)
,	Bank_Name	VARCHAR(50)
,	Bank_Branch	VARCHAR(50)
,	Branch_Code	VARCHAR(50)
,	Designation	VARCHAR(50)
,	Department	VARCHAR(50)
,	Policytype	VARCHAR(100)	
,	ProductID INT	
,	policyNo	VARCHAR(100)
,	SumInsured	[numeric](18, 2)
,	Cummulative	[numeric](18, 2)
,	Premium	[numeric](18, 2)
,	Renewal	VARCHAR(50)
,	Subscriber_Detail_id	INT
,	RelationshipID	INT
,	Plan_id	INT
,	SumInsuredper	VARCHAR(100)
,	CardPer	VARCHAR(100)
,	Employee_No	VARCHAR(50)
,	Bloodgroup	VARCHAR(50)
,	SalaryGrade	VARCHAR(50)
,	CoInsurance	VARCHAR(100)
,	agentcode	VARCHAR(150)
,	member_insurer_id	INT
,	country	VARCHAR(50)
,	district VARCHAR(100)	
,	workflow_current_sequence_id	INT
,	policy_from_date	DateTime
,	policy_to_date	DateTime
,	Contract_Id	INT
,	DateCreated	DateTime
,	covered_from_date	DateTime
,	End_Ren_Date	DateTime
,	endorsement_no	VARCHAR(100)
,	Endorsement_Date	DateTime
,	Parent_Member_detail_id	INT
,	MemberCreatedDate	DateTime
,	ModifiedDate	DateTime
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (member_detail_id),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimMembers]
(
    member_id INT NOT NULL
,	member_code VARCHAR(25)
,	first_name VARCHAR(150)
,	last_name VARCHAR(30)
,	date_birth DATETIME
,	sex VARCHAR(20)
,	subscriber_id numeric(10,0)
,	user_id INT
,	FullMemberName VARCHAR(200)
,	SequenceNo VARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (member_id),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimProcedureCategories]
(
    ProcedureCategoryId INT NOT NULL
,	ProcedureCategoryCode VARCHAR(10)
,	ProcedureCategoryDesc VARCHAR(150)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (ProcedureCategoryId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

Create table dbo.[ExternalTPAdata]
 
(
 [TPA_name] varchar(1000)
,[TPA_code] varchar(1000)
,[BILL_NO] varchar(1000)
,[Modified Claim FIR No] varchar(1000)
,[SBU_Code] varchar(1000)
,[Group name] varchar(1000)
,[POLICY_NO] varchar(1000)
,[Product Type] varchar(1000)
,[Client_code] varchar(1000)
,[Policy_start_ date] DateTime
,[Policy_end_date] DateTime
,[Claim_type] varchar(1000)
,[INSURED_NAME] varchar(1000)
,[Employee_name] varchar(1000)
,[Employee_No] varchar(1000)
,[Member_ID] varchar(1000)
,[Age] varchar(1000)
,[Consolidated Relation] varchar(1000)
,[Provider name] varchar(1000)
,[Provider code] varchar(1000)
,[Payee address] varchar(1000)
,[Payee City] varchar(1000)
,[Payee State] varchar(1000)
,[Date of last document received] DateTime
,[LOSS_DATE] DateTime
,[Date Of Discharge] DateTime
,[Disease Description] varchar(1000)
,[Procedure Description] varchar(1000)
,[Claimed Amount] varchar(1000)
,[NAME_PRINT_ON_CHECK] varchar(1000)
,[PAYMENT_MODE] varchar(1000)
,[PAYEE_ACCT] varchar(1000)
,[PAYEE_BANK_IFSC_CODE] varchar(1000)
,[Delivery_to] varchar(1000)
,[Payable location] varchar(1000)
,[LINE_AMOUNT] varchar(1000)
,[Claim_amount_type] varchar(1000)
,[Service_tax applicable] varchar(1000)
,[TDS applicable] varchar(1000)
,[TDS %] varchar(1000)
,[PAN NO] varchar(1000)
,[Service_tax amount] varchar(1000)
,[Service_tax Registration no] varchar(1000)
,[Serive_tax invoice No] varchar(1000)
,[Service_tax_invoice_date] DateTime
,[Payee Mail ID] varchar(1000)
,[Payee Mobile No] varchar(1000)
,[Claim status] varchar(1000)
,[Status Code] varchar(1000)
,[Claim Number] varchar(1000)
,[Oracle Invoice number] varchar(1000)
,[Error Description] varchar(1000)
,[Date Created] DateTime
,[Date Modified] DateTime
,[Customer Payment Reference Number] varchar(1000)
,[Transferred Date] DateTime
,[Oracle TDS Amount] varchar(1000)
,[Transferred Amount] varchar(1000)
,[Created By] varchar(1000)
,[Modified By] varchar(1000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (TPA_name),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_AverageLOS]
AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Average LOS >= 4 days'

	CREATE TABLE #Temp
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId	INT
	,	HospitalId			INT
	,	HospitalName		VARCHAR(150)
	,	DateAdmit			DATETIME
	,	DateDischarge		DATETIME
	,	LengthofStay		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #Temp 
	SELECT 
		C.claim_form_detail_id
	,	P.provider_id
	,	P.last_name
	,	C.date_of_Admit
	,	C.date_of_Discharge
	,	DATEDIFF(Day,C.date_of_Admit,C.date_of_Discharge) AS LengthofStay

	FROM claim_form_details C
	INNER JOIN providers P ON C.hosp_id = P.provider_id
	WHERE
		ISNULL(C.parent_claim_form_id,0) <> 0

		DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

		INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
		(
			ClaimFormDetailId
		,	FraudParameterId
		,	FraudScore
		)
		SELECT 
			T.ClaimFormDetailId 
		,	@FraudParameterId
		,	@FraudScore

		FROM #Temp T 
		INNER JOIN 
		(
			SELECT T.HospitalId  
			FROM #Temp T			
			GROUP BY
				T.HospitalId
			HAVING 
				AVG(T.lengthofStay) >= 4
		) AS B ON T.HospitalId = B.HospitalId

		DROP TABLE #Temp

		END

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[FactClaimDetails]
(
    	ClaimFIRNo	VARCHAR(50)
	,	Injury	VARCHAR(100)
	,	ClaimType	BIT
	,	ClaimCategory	VARCHAR(10)
	,	AmountBilled	money
	,	AmountNet	money
	,	AmountPaid	money
	,	DoctorName	VARCHAR(50)
	,	DoctorCity	VARCHAR(50)
	,	ClaimFormDetailId	INT
	,	IntimationId	INT
	,	HospitalId	INT
	,	ClaimStatusId	INT
	,	PlaceofServiceId	INT
	,	DateofService	DateTime
	,	DatePaid	DateTime
	,	DateReceived	DateTime
	,	DateofAdmit	DateTime
	,	DateofInjury	DateTime
	,	DateofDocumentation	DateTime
	,	DateofDischarge	DateTime
	,	DateModified	DateTime
	,	WorkflowSequenceId	INT
	,	MemberDetailId	INT
	,	ClassofAccommodation	VARCHAR(50)
	,	HospitalizationType	VARCHAR(50)
	,	Corporate	VARCHAR(100)
	,	ClaimId	INT 
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (ClaimId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE dbo.FraudParameters
(
	FraudParameterId		INT	  IDENTITY(1,1)
,	FraudParameterCode		VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
,	FraudParameterDesc		VARCHAR(200)
,	FraudScore				INT
,	Severity				VARCHAR(50)
,	IsValid					BIT				
,	DateCreated				DATETIME		
,	DateModified			DATETIME		
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (FraudParameterCode),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

INSERT INTO dbo.ClaimsSummary
(
	[ClaimFIRNo]
,	[ClaimType]
,	[HospitalizationType]
,	[ClassofAccommodation]
,	[Procedure]
,	[Diagnosis]
,	[PolicyNo]
,	[PolicyType]
,	[member_code]
,	[FullMemberName]
,	[Gender]
,	[Age]
,	[Hospital]
,	[Corporate]
,	[LengthofStay]
,	[IsFraudClaim]
,	[FraudScore]
,	[ClaimAmount]
,	[ClaimDate]
)
SELECT 
	C.ClaimFormDetailId AS 'Claim FIR No'
,   CASE 
		WHEN C.ClaimType = 0 THEN 'Cashless'
	ELSE 'Reimbursement' END AS 'Claim Type'
,	C.ClaimCategory AS 'Hospitalization Type'
,	C.ClassofAccommodation
,	CPT.CptDescription AS 'Procedure'
,	Icd.IcdDescription AS 'Diagnosis'
,	MDT.policyNo
,	CASE WHEN MDt.employer_id = 0 THEN 'Individual Policy' ELSE 'Group Policy' END AS 'Policy Type'
,	M.member_code
,	M.FullMemberName
,	CASE WHEN M.sex = 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE 'Male' END AS 'Gender'
,	DATEDIFF(YEAR,M.date_birth, GETDATE()) AS 'Age'
,	P.HospitalName AS 'Hospital'
--,	PN.ProviderNetworkType_Desc AS 'Provider Network Type'
,   Emp.EmployerName AS 'Corporate'
,	DATEDIFF(DAY,C.DateofAdmit, C.DateofDischarge) AS 'Length of Stay'
,	CASE WHEN A.ClaimFormDetailId IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS 'IsFraudClaim'
,	A.FraudScore AS 'Fraud Score'
,	C.AmountNet AS 'Claim Amount'
,	C.DateofAdmit AS 'Claim Date'

FROM FactClaimDetails C 
INNER JOIN LnkClaimProcedureDetails L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
INNER JOIN DimProcedureCodes Cpt ON Cpt.CptCodeId = L.CptCodeId
INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes Licd ON Licd.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
INNER JOIN DimDiagnosisCodes Icd ON Icd.IcdCodeId = Licd.IcdCodeId 
INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDt.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id
INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON P.HospitalId = C.HospitalId
--INNER JOIN  Provider_NetworkType PN ON PN.ProviderNetworkType_Id = P.Provider_NetworkType
LEFT OUTER JOIN DimEmployers EMP ON Emp.EmployerId = MDT.employer_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN
(
	SELECT F.ClaimFormDetailId, SUM(L.FraudScore) AS FraudScore
	FROM FactClaimDetails F 
	INNER JOIN LnkClaimFraudParameter L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = F.ClaimFormDetailId
	GROUP BY
		F.ClaimFormDetailId
) A ON A.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes]
(
    ClaimDiagnosisId int NOT NULL 
,	ClaimFormDetailId	INT
,	IcdCodeId INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (ClaimDiagnosisId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[LnkClaimFraudParameter]
(
    LnkCFPId				INT	 IDENTITY(1,1)
,	ClaimFormDetailId		INT
,	FraudParameterId		VARCHAR(200)
,	FraudScore				INT
,	DateCreated				DATETIME 
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (ClaimFormDetailId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[LnkClaimProcedureDetails]
(       
        ClaimProcedureId  INT NOT NULL
	,	ClaimFormDetailId INT 
	,	CptCodeId INT
	,	Billed Money
	,	Net Money
	,	NoofServices numeric(19,2)
	,	PlaceofServiceId INT
	,	Amount	Money
	,	ParentServiceProcedureId Money
	,	GrossAmount Money
	,	ServiceStartDate DateTime
	,	ServiceEndDate DateTime
	,	BilledGross Money
	,	ServiceNet Money
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (ClaimProcedureId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[claim_form_details]
(
    [Claim FIR No] [int] NOT NULL,
	[Claim Type] [varchar](13) NOT NULL,
	[Hospitalization Type] [varchar](10) NULL,
	[Class_of_Accommodation] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[Procedure] [varchar](500) NULL,
	[Diagnosis] [varchar](250) NULL,
	[policyNo] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Policy Type] [varchar](17) NOT NULL,
	[member_code] [varchar](25) NULL,
	[FullMemberName] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Gender] [varchar](6) NOT NULL,
	[Age] [int] NULL,
	[Hospital] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Provider Network Type] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Corporate] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Length of Stay] [int] NULL,
	[IsFraudClaim] [varchar](1) NOT NULL,
	[Fraud Score] [int] NOT NULL,
	[Claim Amount] [money] NULL,
	[Claim Date] [datetime] NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH ([Claim FIR No]),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ClaimsSummary](
	[ClaimFIRNo] [int] NULL,
	[ClaimType] [varchar](13) NOT NULL,
	[HospitalizationType] [varchar](10) NULL,
	[ClassofAccommodation] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[Procedure] [varchar](500) NULL,
	[Diagnosis] [varchar](250) NULL,
	[PolicyNo] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[PolicyType] [varchar](17) NOT NULL,
	[member_code] [varchar](25) NULL,
	[FullMemberName] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Gender] [varchar](6) NOT NULL,
	[Age] [int] NULL,
	[Hospital] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Corporate] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[LengthofStay] [int] NULL,
	[IsFraudClaim] [int] NOT NULL,
	[FraudScore] [int] NULL,
	[ClaimAmount] [money] NULL,
	[ClaimDate] [datetime] NULL
) 
GO

UPDATE ClaimsSummary
SET 
    IsFraudClaim = 0
,    [FraudScore] = 0

 

UPDATE CS
SET CS.IsFraudClaim = 1
,    CS.[FraudScore] = 10
FROM ClaimsSummary CS
INNER JOIN FactClaimDetails C ON C.ClaimFormDetailId = CS.ClaimFIRNo
INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDT.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id
WHERE
    L.IcdCodeId IN 
    (
SELECT C.IcdCodeId
FROM DimDiagnosisCodes c 
WHERE 
    C.IcdDescription LIKE '%delivery%' AND
    M.sex <> 'F')
    

 

UPDATE CS
SET CS.IsFraudClaim = 1
,    CS.[FraudScore] = 10

 

FROM ClaimsSummary CS
INNER JOIN FactClaimDetails C ON C.ClaimFormDetailId = CS.ClaimFIRNo
INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDT.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id
WHERE
    L.IcdCodeId IN 
    (
SELECT C.IcdCodeId 
FROM DimDiagnosisCodes c 
WHERE 
    C.IcdDescription LIKE '%Heart%' AND
    Datediff(Year,M.date_birth,GETDATE())  <= 10)
